com.moosemorals.mediabrowser

Interface PVR.PVRListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Main
    Enclosing class:
    PVR

    public static interface PVR.PVRListener
    For objects that want to know whats happening with this PVR.

      • onBrowse

        void onBrowse(PVR.BrowseType type,
            boolean startStop)
        Called when we start or stop browsing the PVR.

        We can browse in two ways, through upnp (DLNA) or through FTP. Mostly, upnp starts first, and then once we've located a device through upnp, we start browsing through FTP.

        Parameters:
        type - PVR.BrowseType indicating if we're talking about upnp or ftp.
        startStop - boolean true for start, false for stop..
